mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELLER (SELLER_ID, COMPANY_NAME, REPRESENTATIVE, CUSTOMER_CENTER, CUSTOMER_EMAIL, REGISTRATION_NUM, SELLER_PASSWORD, SELLER_TYPE, SELLER_CHANGE_DATE, SELLER_STATUS) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{companyName}, #{representative}, #{customerCenter}, #{customerEmail}, #{registrationNum}, #{sellerPassword}, #{sellerType}, SYSDATE, #{sellerStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, SELL.* FROM (SELECT * FROM SELLER ORDER BY SELLER_REGDATE DESC) SELL) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_ANS (ANS_ID, ANS_CONTENT, ANS_DATE, INQ_ID) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(ANS_ID), 0) + 1 FROM INQUIRY_ANS), #{ansContent}, SYSDATE, #{inqId})
